Key Match Events: Ferguson claimed three wickets without conceding a run off his four overs
Mitchell turned himself into a remarkable batter in all three formats
Post-Match Reflections: New Zealand captain Kane Williamson expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Papua New Guinea captain Assad Vala stated there's lots of learning to take away from the game, especially the batting aspect
Lockie Ferguson said it was nice to get the win, but unfortunate to be heading home
Will Young noted that New Zealand played really well on a tough wicket and Papua New Guinea can hold their head high with the talent they have in their squad
Miscellaneous Highlights: Trent Boult is working his way around the boundary, signing things and posing for photos
This was the last game in T20 format for Trent Boult for New Zealand, and probably his last ever
